title: Company News for Jan 3, 2024
text: Shares of Moderna, Inc. MRNA shot up 13.1% on reports that the pharma giant might launch five new products by 2026. Royal Caribbean Cruises Ltd.’s RCL shares plunged 7.2% on the consumer discretionary sector continuing to lose out. Shares of NVIDIA Corporation NVDA declined 2.7% on the tech sector emerging as the biggest loser of the day. Merck & Co., Inc.’s MRK shares gained 3.9% on healthcare becoming the biggest winner in the session. Want the latest recommendations from Zacks Investment Research?
